Reviews.Title: USB Endoscope
Reviews.Author: PatW "PatW"
Reviews.Content: Product was delivered with a mini-CD which required a player capable of handling the format.  Unfortunately, the website did not have a download available for this model.  After overcoming this hurdle, the endoscope worked perfectly.

Reviews.Title: excellent company to do business
Reviews.Author: Brian Peyton "bmp1967"
Reviews.Content: great product worked well.  There customer service was more than helpful.  they answered all my questions through email promptly.  would defiantly do business with them again.

Reviews.Title: Great Price!
Reviews.Author: Brian E.
Reviews.Content: Works great, easy to install software.  Great for looking into dark places with the built in LED light. Very handy tool.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: Al Amri
Reviews.Content: item is as described, it's quality made, so far it's holding fine and looks like it will last for some time.

Reviews.Title: Great deal on endoscope
Reviews.Author: Dale Randall
Reviews.Content: Purchased this endoscope to use in repairing a base fiddle.  It worked great and I was able to see where I was gluing and where clamps were being applied on a laptop computer.

Reviews.Title: Does the job.
Reviews.Author: MyTunes
Reviews.Content: Not a super professional scope, but it does the job. Nice storage case to keep it from getting beat up.

Reviews.Title: Software is useless.
Reviews.Author: Gary Wood "routelock"
Reviews.Content: The camera works fine.The disk that came with the software didn't run at all.I had to use another program to use the camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
Sensor: 1/9" VGA CMOS. Image Resolution: 648 x 488 pixels (Format: JPEG). Video Resolution: 648x488 pixels (Format: AVI, Frame Rate: up to 30FPS @ VGA).
Focal Distance: 6cm - infinite. Lens: F#2.8 with 54° viewable angle.
Waterproof camera head & cable (handle is NOT waterproof) meet IP68 standard. PE covered cable with ABS handle.
Illumination: 4 white LED lights with adjustable brightness. USB Cable: 200cm (6ft) long with USB 2.0 interface.
Dimension: Flexible cable with handle: 114.1cm (3.7ft). Flexible cable: 88.0cm (2.9ft). Flexible cable diameter: 6.5mm (0.26in). Camera head outer diameter: 8mm (0.31in).
ProductInfo.Name: Vividia 8mm USB Flexible Inspection Camera Borescope Endoscope
